DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether reduce volume ( 30 versus 10 ml ) ropivacaine inject reduce number subject impaired muscle strength follow adductor canal block . We hypothesize adductor canal block 10 ml 0.1 % ropivacaine preserve quadriceps strength compare adductor canal block 30 ml .
DOC.brief_title: Adductor Canal Block Effect 10 Versus 30 ml Ropivacaine Muscle Strength : Randomized Study Healthy Volunteers
